item.title: 阿塞拜疆可能在俄罗斯协议结束后通过乌克兰出口天然气
item.description: 阿塞拜疆总统伊利哈姆-阿利耶夫说，乌克兰和欧盟已与阿塞拜疆接洽，希望在与俄罗斯的现有合同于今年年底到期后，通过乌克兰向欧洲供应天然气。【原文：Azerbaijan has been approached by Ukraine and the European Union to supply natural gas to Europe via Ukraine after an existing contract with Russia expires at the end of the year, President Ilham Aliyev said.】

item.title: 尼日利亚丹格特炼油厂目标日产量达 55 万桶
item.description: 尼日利亚丹格特炼油厂的所有者阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）表示，该厂计划在 9 月前达到至少 60% 的装机容量，并在年底前达到每天 55 万桶的产量。【原文：Nigeria’s Dangote Refinery plans to hit at least 60% of its installed capacity by September and reach 550,000 barrels a day by the end of the year, owner Aliko Dangote said.】

item.title: 沙特财富基金提议将其在塞尔福里奇的股份增至 50
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的文件，沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金已提出收购要约，将其在塞尔福里奇百货公司（Selfridges）的股份增至 50%，此前这家英国百货公司的共同所有者已陷入破产。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund has made an offer that would boost its stake in Selfridges to 50%, according to documents seen by Bloomberg News, after the UK department store’s co-owner fell into insolvency.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉反对派依靠公民保护 7 月 28 日的投票
item.description: 由于国际社会对委内瑞拉即将举行的选举几乎没有监督，公民证人网络是反对党将篡改选票风险降至最低的最大希望。【原文：With very little international oversight of Venezuela’s upcoming election, a network of citizen witnesses is the opposition party’s best hope of minimizing the risk of vote tampering.】

item.title: 大型科技股暴跌加大盈利压力
item.description: 对于科技巨头来说，进入本财报季的风险已经很高。在纳斯达克 100 指数经历了三个月来最糟糕的一周之后，它们的赌注变得更大了。【原文：The stakes were already elevated for technology giants heading into this earnings season. They just got a lot higher after the worst week for the Nasdaq 100 Index in three months.】

item.title: 加密货币行业希望特朗普获胜并取消美国证券交易委员会（SEC

item.title: 贷款强劲增长为 HDFC 银行带来利润惊喜
item.description: 印度最大的私营贷款机构 HDFC 银行拉开了印度金融业财报季的序幕，在强劲的贷款和存款增长的推动下，利润超过了分析师的预期。【原文：HDFC Bank Ltd., India’s largest private sector lender, kicked off the earnings season for the nation’s finance sector with profit that surpassed analyst expectations boosted by a strong loan and deposit growth.】

item.title: 威廉姆斯将开始建设路易斯安那能源通道项目
item.description: 据威廉姆斯公司（Williams Cos.）报道，该公司将在未来几周内开始建设被推迟的路易斯安那能源门户天然气管道。【原文：Williams Cos. will start building its delayed Louisiana Energy Gateway natural gas pipeline in the coming weeks, the company reported.】

item.title: 拜登的高级助手称美国计划对中国的俄罗斯援助实施制裁
item.description: 美国国家安全顾问杰克-沙利文（Jake Sullivan）表示，美国正准备对支持俄罗斯乌克兰战争的中国实体实施新的制裁，并暗示银行可能在制裁之列。【原文：US National Security Adviser Jake Sullivan said the US is preparing new sanctions on Chinese entities that support Russia’s war in Ukraine, and hinted that banks may be in the cross-hairs.】

item.title: 对冲基金对黄金的看涨押注跃升至四年新高
item.description: 基金经理们对黄金的押注跃升至四年来的最高水平，表明投资者对美国总统大选的担忧以及对美联储降息时机的重新关注。【原文：Money managers’ wagers in gold jumped to the highest level in four years, signaling investor concerns surrounding the US presidential election campaign as well as renewed focus on the timing of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 土耳其时隔十余年再获穆迪评级提升
item.description: 穆迪投资者服务公司（Moody's Investors Service）十多年来首次上调了土耳其的信用评级，这是土耳其努力回归经济正统政策的最新里程碑。【原文：Moody’s Investors Service raised Turkey’s credit rating for the first time in over a decade, marking the latest milestone in the country’s efforts to return to economic orthodox policies.】

item.title: 德意志银行从瑞银聘请丹-罗西为信用交易员
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）已从瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）聘请丹尼尔-罗西（Daniel Rossi）担任其投资级信贷交易部门的董事。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has hired Daniel Rossi from UBS Group AG as a director in its investment-grade credit trading unit, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 病毒肆虐，巴西停止向中国出口所有鸡肉

item.title: 宏观交易员狂热的一周：国债下跌，美元跳涨
item.description: 随着交易员们结束了多事的一周，围绕美国总统竞选和全球 IT 大故障的问题挥之不去，国债下跌，美元也迎来了本月的首次周涨幅。【原文：Treasuries slipped and the dollar headed for its first weekly gain this month as traders wrapped up an eventful week, with lingering questions surrounding the US presidential campaign and a major global IT outage.】

item.title: 可可持续短缺，加纳寻求限制部分可可采购量
item.description: 加纳正在寻求限制下一季的部分可可采购量，这表明困扰市场并使期货价格创下新高的严重短缺现象可能远未结束。【原文：Ghana is seeking to limit some cocoa purchases for next season, a sign that severe shortages that have plagued the market and sent futures prices to a record may be far from over.】

item.title: 新日铁聘请蓬佩奥协助收购美国钢铁公司
item.description: 新日本钢铁公司已聘请美国前国务卿迈克-蓬佩奥（Mike Pompeo）帮助完成收购美国钢铁公司的提议，该交易面临唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统两党的反对。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp. has hired former US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo to help complete a proposed purchase of United States Steel Corp., a deal facing bipartisan opposition from Donald Trump and President Joe Biden.】
